text: College basketball is cool, but finding out who bit Beyoncé is cooler. Ever since Tiffany Haddish claimed in GQ ‘ s April issue that a drugged out actress bit the “ Crazy in Love ” singer in the face, pop culture fans have been asking one very important question : Who could do that? Three days later and the Beyhive is left wondering who they can trust, who is innocent and who is holding the big secret. “ This is like the modern day ‘ Who shot J. R.?'” Chrissy Teigen recently joked with Today ‘ s Kathie Lee Gifford and Hoda Kotb. “ Listen, I think we ’ ve all done things under the influence. It ’ s not who I thought, I will say. ” While Chrissy is keeping her lips sealed and
